Accounts suggest the thieves did not make it off the island of Kazuwari, but are hiding west of the Crucible in an area of Kazuwari known as the [Whakupoko Lowveld](/whakupokoLowveld/) * After reclaiming from the stelgaer-ridden depths of the Whakupoko Lowveld (see page for details), donate the artifact to the [Pool of Memories](/poolOfMemories/). * This will unlock three challenges that focus on brute force and savagery. After conquering these duels, you will face off with the final challenge, the Dragonstalkers, another pack of contenders spilling blood in the name of the Slayer. Offering this artifact to the Pool of Memories should allow the Crucible to manifest new challenges based on the memories clinging to it. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Wreak havoc in the Beasts of the Slayer series of Crucible arena events.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | Now that I've offered the Slayer's artifact to the Pool of Memories, I am deemed worthy of facing the Slayer's challenges.
